snippet: The federal judge, Royce C. Lamberth, portrayed the procedure as unnecessary and intended to “actively discourage” meetings between detainees and their lawyers.
abstract: Federal Judge Royce C Lamberth orders military to stop touching groins of detainees at prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, when they are moved from their cells to speak with lawyers; calls searches 'religiously and culturally abhorrent' to Muslims.
lead_paragraph: The federal judge, Royce C. Lamberth, portrayed the procedure as unnecessary and intended to “actively discourage” meetings between detainees and their lawyers.

headline.main: Judge Halts Groin Searches at Guantánamo, Calling Them Abhorrent to Muslims
headline.print_headline: Judge Orders Halt to Groin Searches at Guantánamo, Citing Offense to Muslims
